metadata.title: RocNest - Free Sports Equipment Management Software for Clubs
metadata.description: The #1 free software for managing sports equipment. Inventory, bookings and loans for mountain, climbing, running, cycling clubs and more. No hidden costs.
metadata.keywords: sports equipment management, club inventory management, equipment booking system, free sports club software, equipment tracking app, gear lending system, club management app, sports federation software, climbing gear management, running club equipment, sports warehouse management

hero.title: Manage Your Sports Club Equipment
hero.subtitle: The software that mountain, climbing, running and cycling clubs need to control their inventory, manage bookings and automate equipment loans. Free forever.

features.title: Everything your club needs in one place
features.subtitle: Stop using spreadsheets and WhatsApp to manage equipment. RocNest automates everything.

inventory.title: Complete Inventory Control
inventory.description: Track every piece of equipment: ropes, harnesses, ice axes, skis, bikes... Everything categorized with status, photos and complete usage history.

reservations.title: Smart Booking System
reservations.description: Your members book equipment online in seconds. Automatic confirmation, real-time availability and integrated calendar.

multiOrg.title: Multi-Organization
multiOrg.description: Manage multiple clubs, sections or branches from a single account. Perfect for federations and clubs with multiple locations.

reviews.title: Reviews & Maintenance
reviews.description: Schedule periodic safety reviews with custom checklists. Full maintenance history for every piece of equipment.

security.title: Advanced Security
security.description: Encrypted data, granular roles and permissions, complete audit trail of all actions. Your data is always protected.

free.title: Free Forever
free.description: No tricks, no trial periods, no artificial limits. RocNest is and will always be free for sports clubs.

sports.title: Designed for every type of sports club
sports.subtitle: Whatever your sport, RocNest adapts to your needs

howItWorks.title: Ready in 3 simple steps
howItWorks.subtitle: From zero to managing all your equipment in minutes

step1.title: Create your account
step1.description: Sign up for free in seconds. No credit card, no commitments.

step2.title: Set up your organization
step2.description: Create your club, add categories and start registering your sports equipment.

step3.title: Manage everything!
step3.description: Invite your members, manage bookings and forget about spreadsheets.

quote1.text: We used to use a chaotic Excel to track equipment. With RocNest everything is organized and members can book without making phone calls.
quote1.author: Carlos M.

quote2.text: The review feature has saved us more than once. Now we know exactly when each rope and harness needs inspection.
quote2.author: Laura R.

quote3.text: Managing equipment for three club sections was chaos. With RocNest each section has its own space but everything is under control.
quote3.author: Miguel A.

pricing.title: Free. No tricks. Forever.
pricing.subtitle: We believe sports equipment management shouldn't cost money. That's why RocNest is completely free.

items.question: Is it really free? What's the catch?
items.answer: Yes, RocNest is 100% free. There's no catch. It's a project by RocStatus.com built with passion for sports and technology. There are no hidden premium plans or locked features.

items.question: How long does setup take?
items.answer: Less than 2 minutes. Create your account, set up your organization and you can start registering equipment right away. It's that simple.

items.question: What types of clubs is RocNest for?
items.answer: Any sports club that manages shared equipment: mountain, climbing, running, cycling, skiing, diving, kayaking, sports federations and more.

items.question: Can I manage multiple clubs or sections?
items.answer: Yes. RocNest is multi-organization: you can manage as many clubs or sections as you need from a single account.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use data encryption, secure infrastructure and comply with data protection regulations. Your data is yours and it's protected.

items.question: Can I import data from Excel?
items.answer: We're working on bulk import functionality. For now you can add equipment manually quickly and easily.

cta.title: Ready to organize your club's equipment?
cta.subtitle: Join the sports clubs already managing their equipment smartly with RocNest.
cta.note: Free forever. No credit card required.

footer.description: Free sports equipment management software for clubs and organizations. A project by RocStatus.com.
